column2: ggplot(CollegeData, aes(x = Cost, y = MedIncome, size = Enrollment, fill = Control)) +
labs(x = "Average Total Cost for Tuition, Room, Board, etc.", y = "Median Family Income(in $1,000)") +
guides(size = guide_legend(title = "Undergrad \n Enrollment"), fill = guide_legend(title = "Type of School"))
